description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores decentralization, digital landscapes, and innovative approaches to societal challenges. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses cover topics like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, decentralized innovation, and fostering collaboration across diverse fields.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur. Transforms education, advocates inclusive internet. Explores decentralization, digital landscapes, societal innovation. Unites people, translates visions into ecosystems. Blogs on tech, philosophy, collaboration.
